summary: Hey pals! I’ve only recently come back to this site and I’m looking for blogs to follow, since my dashboard is sort of dead....
body:
Hey pals! I’ve only recently come back to this site and I’m looking for blogs to follow, since my dashboard is sort of dead. Reblog if you post/reblog about any of the listed themes and I’ll follow you!

  • Killing Eve;
  • Game of thrones;
  • The 100 (Clexa things, mainly);
  • Harry Potter (Bellamione is a pretty big guilty pleasure of mine!);
  • She-ra;
  • Oitnb;
  • Lgbt related posts

Also, any wlw ship. Oh, I love nonsense as well. ❤️

summary: Eve killing Raymond would make... so much fucking sense.  It’s so interesting to me because his character is there for two...
body:
Eve killing Raymond would make… so much fucking sense.

It’s so interesting to me because his character is there for two reasons. Tell Villanelle about the new girl and make sure to get rid of her. Now, remember this post I wrote in which I discussed Villanelle’s need for help and that Villanelle elevating Eve to a “God-like” being projects into the idea of Eve, ultimately, being a savior? Or this post in which I mentioned that Eve is essentially a Ghost herself because the way she talks about The Ghost creates a direct sounding-board for Eve? Or that one scene where Eve and Raymond actually meet:

Because truthfully they don’t know each other.

I love how everything eventually connects the entire story chord together because this set-up would make Eve the most secret weapon of them all. It’s esp incredible because she appears to be normal here which is something that neatly ties in with Raymond’s favorite line “boring and discreet”. But nothing about Eve has ever been boring or discreet and Villanelle is someone who knows that, “Eve will know it was me”. Which is just - MINDBLOWING IN A LOT OF WAYS YOU KNOW - because all of this validates them, as people and as a couple. So I honestly can’t wait for Eve to swing in and destroy him because he is one of those walls in Eve and Villanelle’s life that wants to keep them apart.

IM JUST!!! Eve killing Raymond would just mean so much! Instead of her first kill being a random kill, this would really hold together what makes Eve, Eve.

title: KE 2x08 Prediction
body:
I’ve seen most of the promos and i think The 12 will try to buy the thing and while being there they discover Villanelle is with Aaron so…. our old friend Raymond comes back to finish V, Eve kills him to protect V and they run away together….

that is a far as i can go hahaha 


I am curious about Carolyn, clearly shes super shady…so much that they can tell me she works for the KGB and i will believe it

(Also there is a theory about Hugo in reddit and if it’s true… mindblowing)
